feature_model.name: VOD feature model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r VODPlayer(VODPlayer) :m StartPlayer(StartPlayer) :m SelectMovie(SelectMovie) :o ChangeServer(ChangeServer) :o Detail(Detail) :m StartMovie(StartMovie) :o StopMovie(StopMovie) :m VCRInterface(VCRInterface) :m PlayImm(PlayImm) :o Quit(Quit) :o Pause(Pause)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:StartMovie or ~Pause constraint_2:SelectMovie or ~ChangeServer or ~Detail constraint_3:StartMovie or ~StopMovie
